**Question 6**
```{r}
dispint_veg2013<-read.csv("dispint_veg2013.csv", encoding = "UTF-8")

dispint_veg2013_kcal<-
  full_join(dispint_veg2013,
            moyenne_ratio_e_p,
            by = "Produit")%>%
  transmute(Valeur = round(Valeur.x*Valeur.y*10^6,0))%>%
  tidyr::drop_na()%>%
  sum()

dispint_veg2013_kcal

```
